mapper.insert: insert into funding_tb(target_price, present_price, price_per_onetime, people_count, release_date, end_date, movie_id) values (#{targetPrice}, #{presentPrice}, #{pricePerOnetime}, #{peopleCount}, #{releaseDate}, #{endDate}, #{movieId})
mapper.select: select ft.id, ft.movie_id, mt.thumbnail, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where genre = #{genre} limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select ft.id, ft.movie_id, mt.thumbnail, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select ft.id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, mt.running_grade, mt.synopsis, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select ft.id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, mt.running_grade, mt.synopsis, mt.offline_release_date, mt.offline_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select mt.thumbnail, ft.id as funding_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN mt.online_release_date AND mt.online_end_date

select mt.thumbnail, ft.id as funding_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.offline_release_date, mt.offline_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN mt.offline_release_date AND mt.offline_end_date

select mt.thumbnail, ft.id as funding_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN mt.online_release_date AND mt.online_end_date order by ft.present_price desc limit 4

select mt.thumbnail, ft.id as funding_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.offline_release_date, mt.offline_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN mt.offline_release_date AND mt.offline_end_date order by ft.present_price desc limit 4

select mt.thumbnail, ft.id as funding_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.d_day, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() < mt.d_day order by mt.d_day asc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select ft.id, mt.id as movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.genre, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, (ft.end_date - ft.release_date) rest_period, ft.present_price, ft.people_count, mt.movie_name, mt.director_pic, mt.synopsis, ft.price_per_onetime, concat(ft.release_date, ' ~ ', ft.end_date) funding_period, mt.d_day, mt.directing_intension, mt.director_careers, mt.director_awards_film, movie_pic, mt.director as mdirector, mst.filming, mst.art, mst.sound, mst.clothes, mst.script, mst.lighting, mst.editing, mst.music, mst.sound, CASE WHEN curdate() >= mt.online_release_date THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END open from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id join movie_photo_tb mpt on mt.id = mpt.movie_id join movie_staff_tb mst on mt.id = mst.movie_id where curdate() BETWEEN ft.release_date AND ft.end_date AND ft.id = #{fundingId}

select ft.id, mt.id as movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.genre, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, (ft.end_date - ft.release_date) rest_period, ft.present_price, ft.people_count, mt.movie_name, mt.director_pic, mt.synopsis, ft.price_per_onetime, concat(ft.release_date, ' ~ ', ft.end_date) funding_period, mt.d_day, mt.directing_intension, mt.director_careers, mt.director_awards_film, movie_pic, mt.director as mdirector, mst.filming, mst.art, mst.sound, mst.clothes, mst.script, mst.lighting, mst.editing, mst.music, concat(mt.offline_release_date, ' ~ ' , mt.offline_end_date) offline_running_period, tt.theater_name, tt.address, tt.tel, tt.park ,CASE WHEN curdate() >= mt.offline_release_date THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END open from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id join movie_photo_tb mpt on mt.id = mpt.movie_id join movie_staff_tb mst on mt.id = mst.movie_id join running_schedule_tb rst on rst.movie_id = ft.movie_id join theater_tb tt on tt.id = rst.theater_id where curdate() BETWEEN mt.offline_release_date AND mt.offline_end_date AND ft.id = #{fundingId}
select id from funding_tb where movie_id = #{movieId};

select ft.id as funding_id, ft.price_per_onetime, mt.id as movie_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.thumbnail, mt.running_grade, mst.director, mst.script, mt.d_day, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date from funding_tb as ft join movie_tb as mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id join movie_staff_tb as mst on mt.id = mst.movie_id where ft.id = #{movieId}
select * from funding_tb where id = #{fundingId}

select ft.id, mt.thumbnail, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price/10) * 10 funding_rate, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.production from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id WHERE mt.movie_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR mt.actor LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR mt.director LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT ft.id, mt.id AS movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name FROM funding_tb ft JOIN movie_tb mt ON ft.movie_id = mt.id WHERE curdate() BETWEEN ft.release_date AND ft.end_date AND mt.movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');

SELECT MAX(ft.id) AS funding_id, MAX(mt.id) AS movie_id, MAX(mst.id) AS movie_staff_id, MAX(ft.target_price) AS target_price, MAX(ft.price_per_onetime) AS price_per_onetime, MAX(mt.thumbnail) AS thumbnail, MAX(mt.movie_name) AS movie_name, MAX(mt.production) AS production, MAX(mt.make_year) AS make_year, MAX(mt.genre) AS genre, MAX(mt.actor) AS actor, MAX(ft.release_date) AS release_date, MAX(ft.end_date) AS end_date, MAX(mt.d_day) AS d_day, MAX(mt.running_grade) AS running_grade, MAX(mt.synopsis) AS synopsis, MAX(mt.directing_intension) AS directing_intension, MAX(mst.director) AS director, MAX(mst.filming) AS filming, MAX(mst.art) AS art, MAX(mst.sound) AS sound, MAX(mst.clothes) AS clothes, MAX(mst.script) AS script, MAX(mst.lighting) AS lighting, MAX(mst.editing) AS editing, MAX(mst.music) AS music, GROUP_CONCAT(mpt.movie_pic) AS movie_pic, GROUP_CONCAT(mpt.id) AS movie_photo_index, MAX(mt.director_pic) AS director_pic, MAX(mt.director_careers) AS director_careers, MAX(mt.director_awards_film) AS director_awards_film FROM funding_tb ft left outer join movie_tb mt ON ft.movie_id = mt.id left outer JOIN movie_photo_tb mpt ON mt.id = mpt.movie_id left outer JOIN movie_staff_tb mst ON mt.id = mst.movie_id WHERE ft.id = #{id}

select mt.id movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, ft.end_date from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN ft.release_date AND ft.end_date limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select mt.id movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, ft.end_date from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() > ft.end_date limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select mt.id movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, ft.end_date from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() BETWEEN ft.release_date AND ft.end_date AND mt.movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mt.director LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select mt.id movie_id, mt.thumbnail, mt.movie_name, ft.end_date from funding_tb ft join movie_tb mt on ft.movie_id = mt.id where curdate() > ft.end_date AND mt.movie_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or mt.director LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.update: update funding_tb ft set release_date = #{releaseDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, target_price = ${targetPrice}, price_per_onetime = #{pricePerOnetime} where id = #{id}
update funding_tb set end_date = curdate() - 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT rt.id as reservation_id, mt.thumbnail, ft.id AS funding_id, mt.id AS movie_id, mt.movie_name, mt.running_grade, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date, ROUND(ft.present_price / (ft.target_price / 10) * 10) AS funding_rate, mt.production, rt.reservated_at FROM funding_tb ft JOIN movie_tb mt ON ft.movie_id = mt.id JOIN order_tb ot ON ft.id = ot.funding_id JOIN reservation_tb rt ON ot.id = rt.id -- 여기를 수정해보세요 WHERE ot.user_id = #{principal} AND rt.seat_id IS NULL AND CURDATE() BETWEEN mt.online_release_date AND mt.online_end_date ORDER BY rt.reservated_at ASC

SELECT mt.thumbnail, ft.id AS funding_id, mt.id AS movie_id, mt.movie_name, mt.synopsis, mt.running_grade, mt.online_release_date, mt.online_end_date, ft.present_price / (ft.target_price / 10) * 10 AS funding_rate, mt.production, rt.reservated_at FROM funding_tb ft JOIN movie_tb mt ON ft.movie_id = mt.id JOIN order_tb ot ON ft.id = ot.funding_id JOIN reservation_tb rt ON ot.user_id = rt.user_id WHERE ot.user_id = #{principalId} AND ot.selected_seats IS NOT NULL AND curdate() BETWEEN mt.online_release_date AND mt.online_end_date ORDER BY rt.reservated_at ASC
